title: Compiler panics during incremental recompilation, while using an associated constant as array size

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: A-associated-items
labels.description: Area: Associated items such as associated types and consts.

body:
## Code
```
use std::mem::size_of;

trait Tr {
    type Arr;

    const C: usize = size_of::<u64>();
}

impl Tr for str {
    type Arr = [u8; Self::C];
}
```

## rustc --version --verbose

rustc 1.30.0-nightly (f2302daef 2018-09-12)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: f2302daef3608c09e2b50193a64611b18ced86f3
commit-date: 2018-09-12
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 1.30.0-nightly
LLVM version: 8.0
